allow:
Bash(# Epic 1.4 Tasks
for i in {1..5}; do
  case $i in
    1) title="[Epic 1.4 Task 1] Design TranscriptionState data structure" ;;
    2) title="[Epic 1.4 Task 2] Implement state storage mechanism (in-memory)" ;;
    3) title="[Epic 1.4 Task 3] Add state lookup and update methods" ;;
    4) title="[Epic 1.4 Task 4] Implement thread-safety mechanisms" ;;
    5) title="[Epic 1.4 Task 5] Add state validation and consistency checks" ;;
  esac
  
  issue_url=$(gh issue create --repo o2alexanderfedin/Telethon --title "$title" --body "**Parent User Story**: Epic 1 User Story 1.4: Transcription State Management (#13)  
**Epic**: Core Infrastructure & Raw API Support  
**Task Type**: Engineering Task  
**Complexity**: Medium  
**Estimated Hours**: 3-4 hours  

## Task Description
Implementation task for Epic 1.4 - Transcription state management system.

## Technical Requirements
See epic1-analysis.md for detailed TranscriptionState class design and state storage mechanisms.

## Dependencies
- Epic 1.1-1.3 completed
- Thread-safety understanding required

## References
- Parent User Story: #13")
  
  gh project item-add 6 --owner o2alexanderfedin --url "$issue_url"
done

echo "Created Epic 1.4 tasks")

Bash(# Epic 2.1 Tasks - User Type Detection System
for i in {1..6}; do
  case $i in
    1) title="[Epic 2.1 Task 1] Implement user type detection logic" ;;
    2) title="[Epic 2.1 Task 2] Create caching mechanism with TTL" ;;
    3) title="[Epic 2.1 Task 3] Add Premium status verification" ;;
    4) title="[Epic 2.1 Task 4] Implement Bot account detection" ;;
    5) title="[Epic 2.1 Task 5] Add cache invalidation triggers" ;;
    6) title="[Epic 2.1 Task 6] Create fallback mechanisms for API failures" ;;
  esac
  
  issue_url=$(gh issue create --repo o2alexanderfedin/Telethon --title "$title" --body "**Parent User Story**: Epic 2 User Story 2.1: User Type Detection System (#18)  
**Epic**: User Type Management & Quota System  
**Task Type**: Engineering Task  
**Complexity**: Medium  
**Estimated Hours**: 3-4 hours  

## Task Description
Implementation task for Epic 2.1 - User type detection with caching.

## Technical Requirements
See epic2-analysis.md for detailed UserTypeDetector class design and caching mechanisms.

## Dependencies
- Epic 1 (Core Infrastructure) completed
- Telethon client entity resolution

## References
- Parent User Story: #18
- Epic 2 Analysis: [epic2-analysis.md](https://github.com/o2alexanderfedin/telethon-architecture-docs/blob/main/features/voice-transcription/epic2-analysis.md)")
  
  gh project item-add 6 --owner o2alexanderfedin --url "$issue_url"
done

echo "Created Epic 2.1 tasks")

Bash(# Epic 2.2-2.8 Tasks
for epic in "2.2:19:Quota Tracking Infrastructure" "2.3:20:Policy Engine Implementation" "2.4:21:Quota Consumption Management" "2.5:22:Usage Prediction and Warnings" "2.6:23:Premium User Experience" "2.7:24:Error Handling and User Feedback" "2.8:25:Integration with Epic 1 Infrastructure"; do
  IFS=':' read -r epic_num issue_num story_name <<< "$epic"
  
  # Each Epic 2 story gets 4-5 tasks
  task_count=4
  if [ "$epic_num" = "2.3" ] || [ "$epic_num" = "2.6" ]; then
    task_count=5
  fi
  
  for i in $(seq 1 $task_count); do
    title="[Epic $epic_num Task $i] Implementation task $i for $story_name"
    
    issue_url=$(gh issue create --repo o2alexanderfedin/Telethon --title "$title" --body "**Parent User Story**: Epic 2 User Story $epic_num: $story_name (#$issue_num)  
**Epic**: User Type Management & Quota System  
**Task Type**: Engineering Task  
**Complexity**: Medium  
**Estimated Hours**: 3-4 hours  

## Task Description
Implementation task for Epic $epic_num - see epic2-analysis.md for detailed requirements.

## Technical Requirements
Detailed specifications in epic2-analysis.md and parent user story #$issue_num.

## Dependencies
- Epic 1 completed
- Epic 2.1 (User Type Detection) completed

## References
- Parent User Story: #$issue_num
- Epic 2 Analysis: [epic2-analysis.md](https://github.com/o2alexanderfedin/telethon-architecture-docs/blob/main/features/voice-transcription/epic2-analysis.md)")
    
    gh project item-add 6 --owner o2alexanderfedin --url "$issue_url"
  done
done

echo "Created Epic 2.2-2.8 tasks")

Bash(# Epic 3.1-3.8 Tasks (High-Level API & Client Integration)
for epic in "3.1:26:Basic Transcription Method" "3.2:27:Message Object Integration" "3.3:28:Event System for Transcription Progress" "3.4:29:Progress Callbacks and Async Patterns" "3.5:30:Batch Transcription Support" "3.6:31:Quality Rating System" "3.7:32:Comprehensive Error Handling" "3.8:33:Documentation and Examples"; do
  IFS=':' read -r epic_num issue_num story_name <<< "$epic"
  
  # Epic 3 stories get 5-6 tasks each (more complex)
  task_count=5
  if [ "$epic_num" = "3.1" ] || [ "$epic_num" = "3.5" ] || [ "$epic_num" = "3.8" ]; then
    task_count=6
  fi
  
  for i in $(seq 1 $task_count); do
    case "$epic_num-$i" in
      "3.1-1") title="[Epic 3.1 Task 1] Design method signature and parameters" ;;
      "3.1-2") title="[Epic 3.1 Task 2] Implement flexible parameter handling" ;;
      "3.1-3") title="[Epic 3.1 Task 3] Add message validation (voice detection)" ;;
      "3.1-4") title="[Epic 3.1 Task 4] Integrate with Epic 2 user management" ;;
      "3.1-5") title="[Epic 3.1 Task 5] Implement return value processing" ;;
      "3.1-6") title="[Epic 3.1 Task 6] Add comprehensive error handling" ;;
      *) title="[Epic $epic_num Task $i] Implementation task $i for $story_name" ;;
    esac
    
    issue_url=$(gh issue create --repo o2alexanderfedin/Telethon --title "$title" --body "**Parent User Story**: Epic 3 User Story $epic_num: $story_name (#$issue_num)  
**Epic**: High-Level API & Client Integration  
**Task Type**: Engineering Task  
**Complexity**: Medium-High  
**Estimated Hours**: 4-5 hours  

## Task Description
Implementation task for Epic $epic_num - High-level API integration.

## Technical Requirements
Detailed specifications in epic3-analysis.md and parent user story #$issue_num.

## Dependencies
- Epic 1 & 2 completed
- Telethon client integration understanding

## References
- Parent User Story: #$issue_num
- Epic 3 Analysis: [epic3-analysis.md](https://github.com/o2alexanderfedin/telethon-architecture-docs/blob/main/features/voice-transcription/epic3-analysis.md)")
    
    gh project item-add 6 --owner o2alexanderfedin --url "$issue_url"
  done
done

echo "Created Epic 3.1-3.8 tasks")

Bash(# Epic 4.1-4.7 Tasks (Advanced Features & Optimization)
for epic in "4.1:34:Intelligent Caching System" "4.2:35:Supergroup Boost Integration" "4.3:36:External STT Fallback System" "4.4:37:Request Batching Optimization" "4.5:38:Memory Usage Optimization" "4.6:39:Performance Monitoring and Metrics" "4.7:40:Integration and Testing"; do
  IFS=':' read -r epic_num issue_num story_name <<< "$epic"
  
  # Epic 4 stories get 4-5 tasks each (optimization focused)
  task_count=4
  if [ "$epic_num" = "4.3" ] || [ "$epic_num" = "4.6" ]; then
    task_count=5
  fi
  
  for i in $(seq 1 $task_count); do
    case "$epic_num-$i" in
      "4.1-1") title="[Epic 4.1 Task 1] Design LRU cache with TTL management" ;;
      "4.1-2") title="[Epic 4.1 Task 2] Implement cache key generation strategy" ;;
      "4.1-3") title="[Epic 4.1 Task 3] Add cache invalidation logic" ;;
      "4.1-4") title="[Epic 4.1 Task 4] Implement cache performance monitoring" ;;
      "4.2-1") title="[Epic 4.2 Task 1] Implement boost level detection" ;;
      "4.2-2") title="[Epic 4.2 Task 2] Add transcription access calculation" ;;
      "4.2-3") title="[Epic 4.2 Task 3] Integrate with user type system" ;;
      "4.2-4") title="[Epic 4.2 Task 4] Add boost-based quota management" ;;
      *) title="[Epic $epic_num Task $i] Implementation task $i for $story_name" ;;
    esac
    
    issue_url=$(gh issue create --repo o2alexanderfedin/Telethon --title "$title" --body "**Parent User Story**: Epic 4 User Story $epic_num: $story_name (#$issue_num)  
**Epic**: Advanced Features & Optimization  
**Task Type**: Engineering Task  
**Complexity**: High  
**Estimated Hours**: 4-6 hours  

## Task Description
Implementation task for Epic $epic_num - Advanced optimization features.

## Technical Requirements
Detailed specifications in epic4-analysis.md and parent user story #$issue_num.

## Dependencies
- Epic 1-3 completed
- Performance optimization understanding

## References
- Parent User Story: #$issue_num
- Epic 4 Analysis: [epic4-analysis.md](https://github.com/o2alexanderfedin/telethon-architecture-docs/blob/main/features/voice-transcription/epic4-analysis.md)")
    
    gh project item-add 6 --owner o2alexanderfedin --url "$issue_url"
  done
done

echo "Created Epic 4.1-4.7 tasks")
